data: Train Number Three | Flying Kestrel | Rubicon | West | Occident | Great Plain
Train Number Three, the “Flying Kestrel,” vestibuled, had crossed the yellow Rubicon of the West and was mounting toward the Occident up the gentle acclivities of the Great Plain.
